metadata.title: CVE-2021-3598 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: There's a flaw in OpenEXR's ImfDeepScanLineInputFile functionality in versions prior to 3.0.5. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file to an application linked with OpenEXR could cause an out-of-bounds read. The greatest risk from this flaw is to application availability.

criterions.comment: openexr package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
